Duplicate id @+id/native_ad_view, defined or included multiple times in layout/fragment_settings.xml: [layout/fragment_settings.xml defines @+id/native_ad_view, layout/fragment_settings.xml => layout/native_ad_layout.xml defines @+id/native_ad_view]

location.message: Duplicate id @+id/native_ad_view, defined or included multiple times in layout/fragment_settings.xml: [layout/fragment_settings.xml defines @+id/native_ad_view, layout/fragment_settings.xml => layout/native_ad_layout.xml defines @+id/native_ad_view]
Defined here, included via layout/fragment_settings.xml => layout/native_ad_layout.xml defines @+id/native_ad_view
